pullRequest.title: Edited javadoc of checkAttributeSemantics
pullRequest.bodyText:
edited thrown exceptions in checkAttributeSyntax methods
also fixed some bugs where checkAttributeSyntax was not called (in virtual attributes googleGroupsName and unixGroupName)

nodes.bodyText: Not your change, but can you please either update this or remove it. It was probably copy-pasted from fillAttribute().
